original_title: Nayana Wasalathilake’s name gazetted to fill vacant SJB parliamentary seat
original_body_lines: The name of Samagi Jana Balawegaya’s member Nayana Priyankara Wasalathilake has been gazetted to fill the parliamentary seat which remained vacant since the resignation of Badulla District MP Chaminda Wijesiri earlier this week.
The Extraordinary Gazette announcing the appointment of Wasalathilake was issued by the Election Commission on Thursday (Jan.11).
